abstract: A look at one of the entries from last week’s puzzles that stumped our solvers.
lead_paragraph: Anyone up for a rousing game of CALVINBALL? It’s not hard to learn, because players make up the rules as they go along and the only known scoring is either “Q to 12” or “oogy to boogy.” You are allowed to use any sporting equipment you like, and combining the equipment of different sports is highly encouraged. Masks are to be worn at all times and are never to be questioned.
